title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.13.0.17 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2019-9-27 22:30 编辑 

测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft 基岩版 1.13 仍未发布，1.13.0.17为其第9个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。


NOTE:注意：We initially released this beta as version 1.13.0.16 but released an updated build to address some performance issues on Xbox One我们原本发布的是1.13.0.16版本，但随后又发布了一个改善Xbox One性能的版本，然后版本号就变了。

Changes:更改：In this beta, we are testing functionality to counter attempts to hack the player character moving in unsupported ways. Please let us know if you experience any unusual behavior with regards to player character movement at bugs.mojang.com此版本中我们正在测试反作弊以解决使用瞬移外挂和加速外挂的玩家（Discord上很多人深受其害），如果你在走动的时候感觉到有些不对劲，请至bugs.mojang.com进行汇报

Fixes:bug修复：修复了19个bug
Crashes/Performance崩溃/性能
Improved performance when opening the inventory优化打开物品栏时的性能Several performance improvements regarding block rendering对方块渲染方面进行性能优化Fixed a crash that occurred after attacking a pufferfish修复了攻击河豚时发生崩溃的问题Fixed a crash that occurred when using the Character Creator修复了使用角色创造器时发生的崩溃问题

General常规
Partially fixed an issue that caused global resources not to be applied after relaunching the game对重启游戏后应用全局资源失败的问题进行一定的修复Equipped skins are once again retained after closing and relaunching the application重启游戏后可以正确载入上一次使用的皮肤了

Gameplay游玩
Fixed an issue with block updates on a waterlogged block triggering a Redstone update in the same chunk修复了同一区块中浸水的方块不会正确触发红石信号更新的问题Trying to ride a mob our mount no longer uses the item that is currently equipped (MCPE-51196)右键点击坐骑后会正确骑上坐骑而不是使用手上的物品

Mobs怪物
End Crystals are once again visible in the world (MCPE-52261)末影水晶可以正常显示了Items in foxes' mouths no longer appear invisible (MCPE-51993)狐狸嘴里叼着的东西不会出现在奇怪的地方了Decreased the fox's jump attack from 11 blocks to 5 blocks to match Java Edition为了匹配Java版，将狐狸的跳跃攻击范围从11格方块减至5个方块Fixed an issue that reverted horses to their old models and textures修复了马的模型和材质会回退的旧版本的问题

Items物品
Items held in hand once again have the correct offset in third-person view第三人称视角中手持的物品再次拥有正确的偏移值

Character Creator角色创造器
Several fixes and improvements to navigating the Character Creator when using a controller修复和优化了使用控件导航角色创造器的操作Fixed body features becoming misaligned in the Character Creator修复了角色创造器中身体位置出错的问题Fixed the Delete Character screen so it no longer has a transparent background修改了“删除角色”提示界面，使其不会再有透明背景出现

Commands指令
The '/particle' command once again functions properly/particle指令可以正常使用了Fixed an error message that occurred when using the '/help' command修复了使用/help指令的时候出现错误信息的问题

Add-Ons and Script EngineAdd-Ons和脚本引擎
`The boss health bar once again appears when creating a custom wither using Add-Ons使用Add-Ons创建自定义凋灵时，BOSS血量条会正常显示
